projects.title: Verplexity: Real-Time Voice AI Agent
projects.description: A voice-powered AI assistant featuring sub-500ms response times, full-duplex conversation with instant interruption handling, and a 3D particle visualizer built with React Three Fiber. Optimized for natural, human-speed voice interaction.
projects.keyLearnings: Voice AI integration, real-time audio visualization, optimizing latency for voice interactions.
